title: Bonus Episode - Freeway Rick Ross + Comedian Mo Amer
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Freeway Rick Ross sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss his life, how he has turned a negative into a positive following his stint in prison, his thoughts on Snowfall, 'After The Snow', taking care of his intellectual property, and some of the business dealings he might be dealing with. 

Mo Amer sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss his brand new comedy special 'Mohammed in Texas' as well as his upcoming Netflix series based on some of the experiences from his life. He also discusses his family Immigrating to Texas from Kuwait after 9/11, cultural differences he and his families endured, and more! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
